detail_desc: Yoga top in fast-drying jersey with a wide neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Cut out section and a mesh panel at the back, and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Brushed inside.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey containing some silk in a relaxed fit.
T-shirts in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline.
Fitted, knee-length dress in sturdy, ribbed jersey with short sleeves and a trim around the neckline.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed cotton jersey with narrow elastication and overlocked frill trims around the neckline and armholes.
Loafers with rounded, slightly pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and removable inserts. Frill at the front and along the narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a smocked hem and no fasteners.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a high waist and raw-edge, cut-off hems.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Leather sandals with thin leather straps that tie around the ankle and decorative studs in the sides of the soles. Leather-covered heels, 4.5 cm.
Hat in a soft, glittery knit with an appliqué on the front, pompom on the top, earflaps, and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.
Espadrilles with a braided jute trim around the soles. Rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a zip fly and button, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
T-shirt in patterned cotton jersey with embroidery in a straight, wide style with dropped shoulders.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neckline and intarsia motif with an appliqué on the front. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with worn details, a lined hood, kangaroo pocket, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a gently rounded, raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumpsuit in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and contrasting colour details. Zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a button, fake front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Short, sleeveless dress in stretch lace with a small stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Jersey lining.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Baby Exclusive. Small comfort blanket in an organic cotton weave with a padded head. Size approx. 17x32 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.
Fitted T-shirts in soft, stretch organic cotton jersey with a V-neck and straight-cut hem.
High-waisted lace briefs with a lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Short, wide dress in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline and long, slightly wider sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Gathered seam at the hips for added volume at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Sleeveless top in airy chiffon with a beaded embroidery pattern, a round neck and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Satin lining.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a deep V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jersey-lined, pull-on trousers in lightweight washed denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake side pockets and fake flap pockets on the legs.

Non-wired lace triangle bra with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that divide into two at the front. Narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes and an elasticated hem.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck and padded cups with removable inserts. Double narrow shoulder straps, a mesh section at the back and wide elastication at the hem. Medium support.

Set with a top and pair of joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Top with a flounce-trimmed yoke, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Triangle bikini top with frill-trimmed shoulder straps and lined, lightly padded cups that shape the bust. Front fastening.
Long-sleeved jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Adjustable tab and buttons at the sides, and buttoned cuffs.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with lightly padded, moulded cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps that connect to a lace racer back. No fasteners.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an all-over print and regular, elasticated waist. Side pockets, low crotch and tapered legs.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in soft jersey.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved kimono in a viscose weave with a V-neck and concealed buttons down the front. Drawstring with ties at the sides, side pockets and slits in the sides of the hem.
Lined bandeau bikini top with padded cups with removable inserts, narrow tie-top shoulder straps, side support and straps that tie at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knee-length skirt in soft, organic cotton jersey. High waist with elastication at the top for best fit over the tummy.
Short-sleeved nightdresses in soft, printed cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Cargo trousers in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets, flap back pockets with press-studs and bellows pockets on the legs with a flap and press-studs. Elastic drawstrings with plastic cord locks at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Belt in soft suede that winds around the waist and ties at the front. Width 11 cm.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
5-pocket stretch cotton twill trousers in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with a deep V-neck, long trumpet sleeves and a concealed zip in one side. Seam at the waist with a peplum and detachable belt.

Blouse in woven fabric with short, flounced sleeves and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Yoke at the front with pin-tucks and lace insets. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.
Shorts in stretch cotton corduroy with covered elastication at the waist, a decorative bow at the front and side pockets.
Waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, adjustable hook and loop fastening at the front and a loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Dress in jersey made from a viscose blend in a straight cut at the top with adjustable straps and metal fasteners.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a wide neckline and tie detail at the front.
Baby Exclusive. T-shirt in soft organic cotton slub jersey with a button placket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Wool coat with notch lapels, a press-stud fastening at the front and a single back vent. Lined.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a tie at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Lined.
Glittery Alice band decorated with a fabric Santa hat.
5-pocket jeggings in washed, stretch denim with a low waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs. Push up – denim with a superstretch function that showcases the body’s physique.
Ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. High, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in twill made from a viscose blend with a high waist and detachable tie belt. Pleats, a concealed zip in the side seam and a gathered seam at the hem with a flounce.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a deep neckline, short sleeves and buttons down the front.
Oversized shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a large chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Wide, straight-cut T-shirt in pima cotton with jersey ribbing around the neckline.
Bralette in soft lace with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.
Short dress in flock-print mesh with a frill-trimmed yoke at the front, short sleeves with a flounced trim, and a flounce at the hem. Sewn-in underdress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved playsuit in soft, textured jersey with a wrapover front and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim with worn details. High waist, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Small bucket bag in soft suede with a drawstring and narrow shoulder strap in leather at the top. Concealed magnetic fastening and one inner compartment. Cotton twill lining. Size 12x16x17 cm.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck and long sleeves.
